name: Catfish
description: Privileged Zoom Team Chat impersonation sender

clientId.label: Zoom Client ID
clientId.help: Dedicated Catfish S2S OAuth client id (or CATFISH_ZOOM_CLIENT_ID).

clientSecret.label: Zoom Client Secret
clientSecret.help: Dedicated Catfish S2S OAuth client secret (or CATFISH_ZOOM_CLIENT_SECRET).

accountId.label: Zoom Account ID
accountId.help: Zoom account id for account_credentials grant (or CATFISH_ZOOM_ACCOUNT_ID).

requiredScopes.label: Required Scopes
requiredScopes.help: Required OAuth scopes. Defaults to teamchat:admin:write and team_chat:write:user_message:admin.

auditLogPath.label: Audit Log Path
auditLogPath.help: Optional absolute path for Catfish JSONL audit records.
